mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id

select
a.id, a.name, u.name owner, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy
from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id
where a.id=#{id}

select
car.id id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name owner
from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on a.id=car.activityId
where car.clueId=#{clueId}

select
a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.owner
from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id
where a.name like '%' #{aname} '%' and a.id not in( select
activityId
from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId=#{clueId}
)

select
a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.owner
from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id
where a.name like '%' #{aname} '%'
